summary: Sven Broddson is a pirate from the north, he traveled to skyrim to find a women. However, he was captured by the Empire, accused of being a Stormcloak.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/K3mmN05.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8fTvzSc.jpg[/img]
Sven Broddson is a pirate from the north, where he is known as a dangerous man. he traveled to skyrim to find slaves, to bring back to north. hHis ship is destroyed, and to fix it he travels around to find parts to fix it. There he runs into the Stormcloak, which gets him into trouble. He is accused of being a Stormcloak, and is captured by the Empire.
[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/QRUWlh3.jpg[/img]

If you won't him to look like Sven Broddson, you need:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D10168%26preview%3D&pUp=1]ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D2488%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Faces - GeonoxFaces + Underwear - Default[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Normal Resolution[/url]
author: MissRattata
